ygData.subject: A sleeping Giant
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron slept silently. The only way you could tell he was alive was by the up and down motion of his chest. Suddenly he blurted out in his sleep... No momy

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron slept silently. The only way you could tell he was alive was by 
the up and down motion of his chest. Suddenly he blurted out in his sleep... 
"No momy i dont want to go play with the autobots. They're mean to me" he 
stuck his thumb in his mouth and fell back to a deep sleep.
 Guiledart and Megastrom looked at eachother. It took all of thier strength 
to break out laughing.

--part1_63.1138cded.27ab12ab_boundary
